item.title: US Navy admiral ordered second deadly Venezuela boat strike, White House says
item.description: The strikes, authorised by Defence Secretary Pete Hegseth, have raised fresh legality questions - but the White House says laws have been followed.

item.title: Zambian-American influencer sentenced to 18 months for hate speech
item.description: Known as "One Boss Lady", Ethel Chisono Edwards has become known for her rants about the president.

item.title: Pope prays at Beirut port blast site on last day of Lebanon visit
item.description: Pope Leo XIV demanded justice for the more than 200 victims of the disaster, at the end of his three-day visit to Lebanon.

item.title: Pope prays at Beirut port blast site on last day of Lebanon visit
item.description: Pope Leo XIV demanded justice for the more than 200 victims of the disaster, at the end of his three-day visit to Lebanon.

item.title: Bulgaria ditches budget plan after tens of thousands join protests
item.description: Demonstrators said the plan - the country's first in euros - attempted to hide widespread government corruption.
